description: This file defines shared constants such as strings, spacings, and paddings used throughout the Flutter app.

classes.name: AppStrings
classes.description: Contains static string constants used across the app, e.g., app name.

classes.name: AppSpacings
classes.description: Defines static SizedBox constants representing different spacing sizes.

classes.name: AppPaddings
classes.description: Defines static EdgeInsets constants for consistent padding.
